content: 2-in-1 Setting tools for long drop-in anchors 2-in-1 Setting tools for long embedment drop-in anchors (HDI-TZ/HDI+(L)) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - - ### FEATURES:Features Drill holes precisely to the desired depth No need to change tools – drilling and setting can be done with the same tool Up to 50% faster than the traditional method (overhead hammering) – increasing productivity Large rubber grip for easier handling Drilling and setting with one tool Applications Installation of Hilti HDI drop-in anchors for fastening pipes, air ducts and suspended ceilings Installation of HDI drop-in anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Anchor type: Flush anchors Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Anchor type | Flush anchors | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | Multi Cutter | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2112766 - Set tool & Drill Bit Combo HDI(-L)+ 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI+/HDI-TZ 1/2 Setting tool assy - 2112762 - Set tool & Drill Bit Combo HDI(-L)+ 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI(-L)+ 1/4 Setting tool assy - 2112764 - Set tool & Drill Bit Combo HDI(-L)+ 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI(-L)+ 3/8 Setting tool assy - 2417749 - HDI-TZ 3/8 2-in-1 Setting Tool - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-TZ 3/8 Setting tool assy
